title: Pier Luigi Bersani - Wikipedia
snippet: Pier Luigi Bersani (Italian pronunciation: [ˈpjɛr luˈiːdʒi berˈsaːni]; born 29 September 1951) is an Italian politician and was Secretary of the Democratic Party (PD), Italy's leading centre-left party, from 2009 to 2013.

title: Pier Luigi Bersani - La Regione e la sua storia - Regione Emilia-Romagna
snippet: Nasce a Bettola (Piacenza) nel 1951 · Si laurea in Filosofia a Bologna e compie una breve esperienza come insegnante. title: Pier Luigi Bersani
snippet: Pier Luigi Bersani (born 29 September 1951) is an Italian politician known for his long career in centre-left politics, including roles as Secretary of the Democratic Party from 7 November 2009 to 20 April 2013 and Minister of Economic Development ...

title: Pier Luigi Bersani | Italian politician | Britannica
